text: I have done nothing of the sort!
speaker: Discord

text: Oh, please, I've seen this before. But he was always weak minded. You are Discord, you are legend, you cannot fall into the same trap that claimed my brother! Help me to grow strong, and be rewarded with something far greater than *friendship*. *Freedom*. Once I've stripped these ponies of their magic, nothing would give me greater pleasure than to see their world turned upside down. Who better to do so than the master of chaos himself? Join me, Discord, and reclaim your greatness. Unless, of course, 'pony errand boy' is the role you've always wanted to play in this world.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: I think I found something! I've been reading our journal, and there's something interesting about the sections that Discord bookmarked. Applejack, do you remember when you had to tell everypony that the tonic Granny bought from the Flim Flam brothers didn't really work?
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: How could I forget? It was one of the hardest things I ever had to do.
speaker: Applejack

text: [flashback] I hate to disappoint everypony, but there's no way Granny could have made that dive, because this tonic is a fake!
speaker: Applejack

text: [present] And in that moment, I knew I had to be honest. I just knew it. But what's that got to do with openin' the chest?
speaker: Applejack

text: I've found that each of you has had to face a situation where living up to the Element of Harmony you represent wasn't easy. Fluttershy, it was when you realized that the way to show kindness to the Breezies was by forcing them to leave your home.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Oh, the looks on their poor little faces! But I knew that, as difficult as it was, pushing them away was the kindest thing I could do.
speaker: Fluttershy

text: Rarity, even after Suri took advantage of your generosity at Fashion Week in Manehattan, you didn't let it cause you to abandon your generous spirit.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I simply couldn't have lived with myself if I didn't do something special for the friends who have always been so generous to me!
speaker: Rarity

text: Rainbow Dash, you had the chance to fly with the Wonderbolts at the Equestria Games, but instead you chose to compete with your friends.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Sure! But being loyal to my friends was way–
speaker: Rainbow Dash

text: Ooh, my turn, my turn!
speaker: Pinkie Pie

text: Pinkie Pie, you realized that seeing your friend laugh was more important than proving you were a better party planner than Cheese Sandwich.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Best party I've ever had.
speaker: Rainbow Dash

text: It's clear we've all had our moments to shine, Twilight, but I'm with Applejack. What does any of this have to do with the opening of the chest?
speaker: Rarity

text: All of you had tough choices to make. But when you made the right one and embraced your element, it helped somepony else make the right choice too. Each of you received something from the pony whose life you helped change. I know it sounds crazy, but maybe there's something special about those objects that could lead us to the location of the keys. The chest is connected to the Tree of Harmony, the Tree is connected to the Elements, and the Elements are connected to all of us. There must be a connection! I hate to admit it, but maybe Discord was trying to be a good friend after all.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I don't see anything on them that would give us a clue as to where the keys might be. They're just... ordinary, everyday objects.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Come on, Boneless! Give us that key!
speaker: Pinkie Pie

text: I don't think that's going to work.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: There's still one key missing. The key that represents the element of magic. My element.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Oh, but I'm sure that if we've gotten our keys, you have too, Twilight.
speaker: Fluttershy

text: Think, Twilight. When have you completed a difficult magical task, and in doing so encouraged another pony to do the same?
speaker: Rarity

text: I haven't. If I had, I would have written about it in the journal.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Don't worry, Twilight. I'm sure you'll get your key eventually. [sharp inhalation] [hurk!]
speaker: Spike

text: What's it say?
speaker: Spike

text: That I'm needed in Canterlot at once!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I came as quickly as I could! Is something wrong? Is it Tirek?
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I'm afraid I put too much trust in Discord and the effect that friendship would have upon him.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Discord has betrayed the ponies of Equestria and joined forces with Tirek.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: How could he do this?! I thought our friendship meant something to him! I thought he had changed.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Tirek has stolen enough magic that he now has the strength to steal flight as well. Without Pegasi to control the weather, there will be no rain in Equestria. There is word he has gone after Earth ponies as well. Without their strength, they will not be able to tend the land.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Ponies will no longer be in control of their world. That power will belong solely to Tirek.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: There is no doubt that Tirek is after Alicorn magic. With Discord by his side, we will not be able to stop him from taking it.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Once it is in his possession, his power will know no bounds, and all hope will be lost.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: But there is one solution. It is only by making this sacrifice that Equestria and the lands beyond it might be saved. We must rid ourselves of our magic before Tirek has the chance to steal it from us.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: What's wrong, Twilight?
speaker: Fluttershy

text: It doesn't seem that my new role as a princess equates to all that much.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I am Lord Tirek, and I will take what should have been mine long ago.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: With each passing moment, he grows stronger still.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: And I know just the princess who can stop him.
speaker: Princess Cadance

text: I'm afraid I must call in another to stop Tirek.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: [laughs] Oh, you're talking about me, I presume?
speaker: Discord

text: Haven't you girls just learned so much?
speaker: Discord

text: And there's something interesting about the sections that Discord bookmarked.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Each of you received something from the pony whose life you helped change.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: There's still one key missing. My element.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Join me, Discord, and reclaim your greatness.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Discord has betrayed the ponies of Equestria and joined forces with Tirek.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: There is no doubt that Tirek is after Alicorn magic.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: We must rid ourselves of our magic before Tirek has the chance to steal it from us.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Tirek is set on possessing Alicorn magic. When he comes for us, we cannot have what he is looking for.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: I'm more than willing to do my part and give up my magic.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: You misunderstand. Our magic cannot just disappear into thin air. Somepony must keep it safe.
speaker: Princess Luna

text: That somepony is *you*, Twilight.
speaker: Princess Cadance

text: Why me?
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: We do not believe that Tirek is aware that a fourth Alicorn princess exists in Equestria. If we transfer our magic to you, Tirek will not know where it has gone.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Do you understand what we're asking of you?
speaker: Princess Cadance

text: Yes. It's just... I'm only now learning how to control my *own* alicorn magic. To take on even more–
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Twilight, you represent the element of magic. If there is anypony who can do this, it's you.
speaker: Princess Cadance

text: Taking on this task will be one of the most difficult things I'll ever do, but with the help of my friends–
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I'm sorry, Princess Twilight, but you must keep your new abilities a secret. I fear that your friends being aware of your new power could put them at great risk. Do you still think you can take on this responsibility?
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: This is the role I am meant to play as a princess of Equestria! I will not fail to do my duty!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Then we must begin at once.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: [shivers] That can't be right.
speaker: Discord

text: What can't be right?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Nothing. Carry on.
speaker: Discord

text: [out of breath] It is done.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: [snoring] You weren't gone very long. Does that mean everything's okay?
speaker: Spike

text: Yep! Everything's fine! [chuckles nervously]
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: In that case, I'm going back to bed. Sun's not up... and neither am I.
speaker: Spike

text: [hushed] That's strange. The sun should be up by now... [gasps] The sun should be up by now! [inhales, exhales] You can do this.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Shining Armor, why, whatever are you doing here?
speaker: Discord

text: Back off, traitor.
speaker: Shining Armor

text: The only one Discord betrayed was himself. Abandoning his true nature to make *friends* with weak-minded equines who offer him nothing! [laughs, chews]
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: [weakly] How... could you... do this...?
speaker: Shining Armor

text: Why don't you go and have a little fun? I won't stand in your way.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: [inhales] What have you done?! [inhales] *Where is your magic?!*
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: I have to gain better control. I sure can't practice here.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Uh, Twilight, [pants] where are we goin'?
speaker: Spike

text: Oh, uh, hi, Spike. Uh, gotta go...somewhere...else.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Waaaaah! Whoa!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Whoa! Twilight?
speaker: Rainbow Dash

text: Yiiiipe!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Ooh!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Oh, my goodness, are you all right?
speaker: Fluttershy

text: Jumpin' junebugs, Twilight! When did *you* learn to fly that fast?
speaker: Applejack

text: I must have caught a particularly strong breeze... or something.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Must have been "or something", because there wasn't any breeze up there.
speaker: Rainbow Dash

text: I don't know what happened, but I don't really have time to figure it out right now.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Another visit to the Castle of the Two Sisters, I presume? We'd be more than happy to accompany you!
speaker: Rarity

text: Not today!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Tirek may still be a threat. I need you all to stay here and encourage everypony to remain inside.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Getting rid of your magic so that I cannot take it from you? That was your plan? How does it feel, knowing that soon, every Pegasus, unicorn and Earth pony will bow to my will, and that there is *nothing* you can do to stop it?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: You will not prevail, Tirek.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Give my regards to Cerberus.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: You meant *our* will, didn't you?
speaker: Discord

text: Of course. Here, I want you to have something. This was given to me by someone very close to me. I give it to you as a sign of my gratitude and loyalty.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Oh, my! I do love a good accessory. I suppose that's Rarity's influence.
speaker: Discord

text: [laughs] Amusing. But we have no time for such things. With the princesses out of the way, we can now– is *this* meant to be *humorous*?!
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Oh, no, I haven't touched that one yet.
speaker: Discord

text: There's a fourth? And you did not tell me this?!
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: I just needed some assurance that you truly considered this a *team* effort. And now I have it.
speaker: Discord

text: Then where can we find this *fourth princess*? Where is *her* castle?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Castle? [laughs] No, Princess Twilight lives above a library in Ponyville. Castle? [laughs]
speaker: Discord

text: Not for much longer.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Alright, y'all. I think we've warned everypony to stay inside.
speaker: Applejack

text: I'm sure Discord will catch Tirek and this will all be over soon.
speaker: Fluttershy

text: I'll bet he takes his sweet time.
speaker: Rainbow Dash

text: Or perhaps these things just *take* time.
speaker: Discord

text: [gasps] You're back! Did you bring the cucumber sandwiches?
speaker: Fluttershy

text: I did. I imagine they'll be your last decent meal for quite some time.
speaker: Discord

text: Ta-da!
speaker: Discord

text: You've gathered up all of them?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: And her little dragon, too.
speaker: Discord

text: [crying] Why are you doing this? I thought we were friends!
speaker: Fluttershy

text: Oh, we *were*. But Tirek offered me so much more than just tea parties. Surely you saw this coming.
speaker: Discord

text: [crying] I didn't. I really didn't.
speaker: Fluttershy

text: You really think she'd do anything for them?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: If Twilight has magic to give, it will be yours. Soon there won't be a Pegasus, Earth pony or unicorn who will be able to stand up against us.
speaker: Discord

text: *Us*? Who said anything about *us*?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: You did.
speaker: Discord

text: You've helped me grow strong, you've provided the means by which I can obtain Princess Twilight's magic, and now you are no longer of any use to me.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: [weakly] But you said this was a sign of your gratitude and loyalty. A gift from someone close to you.
speaker: Discord

text: My brother who betrayed me. It is as worthless as he is.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Surely you saw this comin'.
speaker: Applejack

text: [weakly] I didn't. I truly didn't.
speaker: Discord

text: I can do this.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: See! Ha! Perfectly controlled teleportation–
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: *Princess Twilight!*
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: [gasps] Tirek!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: *You have something that belongs to me!*
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: You're going to give me what I want! [inhales]
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Now I understand what your fellow princesses have done!
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: It appears we are at an impasse. How about a trade, Princess Twilight? Their release for all the Alicorn magic in Equestria.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: What's it going to be, Princess?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: [muffled] Don't do it, Twilight!
speaker: Rainbow Dash

text: [muffled] We aren't worth it!
speaker: Fluttershy

text: [muffled] Oh, but you are, Fluttershy. You're the pony that taught me that friendship is magic. I had magic *and* friendship, and now I don't have either.
speaker: Discord

text: *Enough!* I want an answer, and I want it now!
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: I will give you my magic, in exchange for my friends.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: As you wish.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: *All* of my friends.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: After the way he has betrayed you, you still call him a 'friend'?
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Release him!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: If that's what you want.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Thank you, Twilight. [to Fluttershy, hushed] I'm sorry.
speaker: Discord

text: I know.
speaker: Fluttershy

text: Your turn.
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: [roars] Yes!
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: Twilight, what were you thinking?!
speaker: Spike

text: Tirek tricked me into believing that he could offer me something more valuable than friendship. But there is nothing worth more. I see that now. He lied when he said that this medallion was given as a sign of gratitude and loyalty. But when *I* say that it is a sign of our true friendship, I am telling the truth.
speaker: Discord

text: You think that might be the last one we need?
speaker: Applejack

text: We have to get to the chest.
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Together! I think we have to do this together!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: How is this possible?! You have no magic!
speaker: Lord Tirek

text: You're wrong, Tirek! I may have given you my Alicorn magic, but I carry within me the most powerful magic of all!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Sweet Celestia! Are you all seeing what I'm seeing?
speaker: Rarity

text: But... whose is it?
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: I believe it is yours, Princess Twilight.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: You've been wondering what you are meant to do as a princess. Do you know now?
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: As princess, I believe I have the power to spread the magic of friendship across Equestria. That is the role I am meant to have in our world! The role I *choose* to have! But I didn't defeat Tirek on my own – it took all of us to unlock the chest!
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text: Then it is unlikely you are meant to take on this task alone.
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Wowee!
speaker: Pinkie Pie

text: You are now Twilight Sparkle, the princess of friendship. But what is the princess of friendship without her friends?
speaker: Princess Celestia

text: Wait a minute, where's *my* throne?!
speaker: Discord

text: I don't think you're quite there yet.
speaker: Fluttershy

text: [chuckles] Yes, well, I suppose not.
speaker: Discord

text:
Each one of us has something special
That makes us different, that makes us rare
speaker: Twilight Sparkle

text:
We have a light that shines within us
That we were always meant to share
speaker: Fluttershy

text:
And when we come together
Combine the light that shines within
There is nothing we can't do
There is no battle we can't win
speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Pinkie Pie

text:
When we come together
There'll be a star to guide the way
It's inside us every day
speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Pinkie Pie

text: See it now! See it now!
speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Pinkie Pie

text:
Let the rainbow remind you
That together we will always shine
Let the rainbow remind you
That forever this will be our time
speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
Applejack
Pinkie Pie

text:
Let the rainbow remind you
That together we will always shine
speaker: Twilight Sparkle
